name: Speech Anxiety
detailed_description: This training program allows a client with speech anxiety to practice speaking in front of a large audience. The therapist can turn on a lamp that shows the client to what extend they are able to keep the interest and attention of the audience. The better they perform, the brighter the light shines. This is influenced by three factors: speaking loud and clear, standing up straight, and using body language. The program also shows the therapist which of these factors the client is applying.
